solution_line_template: In the afternoon there are {initial_loaves} - {sold_loaves} = <<{initial_loaves}-{sold_loaves}={loaves_after_sales}>>{loaves_after_sales} loaves of bread left.
By the evening there is a delivery and there are now {loaves_after_sales} + {delivered_loaves} = <<{loaves_after_sales}+{delivered_loaves}={loaves_end_of_day}>>{loaves_end_of_day} loaves of bread.
